18#include <algorithm>
19#include <iterator>
20#include <initializer_list>
21#include <numeric>
22#include <cstring>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25
26template <typename Container, typename Value>
27auto Find(const Container& c, const Value& v) -> decltype(std::begin(c)) {
28 return std::find(std::begin(c), std::end(c), v);
29}
30
31template <typename Container, typename Predicate>
32auto FindIf(Container& c, Predicate p) -> decltype(std::begin(c)) {
33 return std::find_if(std::begin(c), std::end(c), p);
34}
35
36template <typename Container, typename Value>
37auto Contains(const Container& c, const Value& v) -> decltype(std::begin(c), bool()){
38 return Find(c, v) != std::end(c);
39}
40
41template <typename ListType, typename Value>
42auto Contains(const std::initializer_list<ListType>& c, const Value& v) -> decltype(std::begin(c), bool()){
43 return Find(c, v) != std::end(c);
44}
45
46inline bool Contains(const char* str, char c) {
47 return strchr(str, c) != nullptr;
48}
49
50template <typename Container, typename Value = typename Container::value_type, typename Op = std::plus<Value>>
51Value Reduce(const Container& c, Value v = Value{}, Op op = {}) {
52 return std::accumulate(std::begin(c), std::end(c), v, op);
53}
54
55// see C++20 ssize
56template <class Container>
57constexpr auto Size(const Container& c) -> decltype(c.size(), int()) {
58 return static_cast<int>(c.size());
59}
60
61template <class T, std::size_t N>
62constexpr int Size(const T (&)[N]) noexcept {
63 return static_cast<int>(N);
64}
65
66template <typename Container, typename Value>
67int IndexOf(const Container& c, const Value& v) {
68 auto i = Find(c, v);
69 return i == std::end(c) ? -1 : std::distance(std::begin(c), i);
70}
71
72inline int IndexOf(const char* str, char c) {
73 auto s = strchr(str, c);
74 return s != nullptr ? static_cast<int>(s - str) : -1;
75}
76
77template <typename Container, typename Value, class UnaryOp>
78Value TransformReduce(const Container& c, Value s, UnaryOp op) {
79 for (const auto& v : c)
80 s += op(v);
81 return s;
82}
83
84} // ZXing
85
